In the Matter of Domestic M. Pafundi, Jr., Appellant, v. James E. Allen, Jr., as Commissioner of Education of the State of New York, Respondent. In the Matter of Fred L. Yerdon, Appellant, v. James E. Allen, Jr., as Commissioner of Education of the State of New York, Respondent. Submitted September 28, 1964; decided October 1, 1964.

No opinion found. Click here to view source material.
